org.sabre.workflow.context.persistence

Class InMemoryContextPersister

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.sabre.workflow.context.persistence.InMemoryContextPersister
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ContextPersister

    public class InMemoryContextPersister
extends java.lang.Object
implements ContextPersister
    Simple Implementation of Context Persister. This saves the context into a Map and retrieves it based on the name of the Context.
